column1: @entity1 was at home, sitting in her chair. She was drinking orange juice. @entity0 juice was her favorite drink, because she loved its sweet taste.@entity1's sister was sitting on the carpet. She was drawing a pair of pink socks. @entity1's sister loved the color pink, because she thought it was cute.@entity1's brother was also sitting on the carpet. He was drinking coffee with lots of sugar in it. He loved sugar because it made him feel energetic.All of the sudden, there was a knock at the door. @entity1's sister answered it. When she opened the door, she saw an alligator wearing a suit and tie! @entity1's sister screamed, and closed the door."Please," the alligator said, "Do not be afraid. I want to draw with you."@entity1's sister opened the door, and the alligator came inside. He sat on the carpet, and started drawing his own pair of pink socks. @entity1's sister sat down, and joined him.
